infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to show your current location on the map and help you set your location for dating preferences.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location to show your current location on the map and help you set your location for dating preferences.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to select profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take profile pictures.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
